TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Gbayang, title = Gbayang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gbayang} }

S.FORM: Gbayang Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hualien ko Gbayang a niyaro', 120 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 368 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 359 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Truku 88%, Amis 1%, Tayal 2%, Kebalan 1%, roma 5%.

Gbayang Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hoalien ko Gbayang a niyaro', 120 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 368 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 359 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Troko 88%, Amis 1%, Tayal 2%, Kebalan 1%, roma 5%.
